name: LessThanHighSchoolEducationInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Less Than High School Education Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the interventions associated with less than a high school education as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT less than high school education interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes social determinant of health general interventions used in multiple domains.)
